Instance.description: The Base Story Chapter from which all story arcs are derived. All subclasses provide separate story progression actions available as well as separate functionality for distributing loots, drama nodes, etc. to better match with the type of tracker they are a part of. Example: households can not get pregnant and when they hand out loots it is to the entire household rather than just a single Sim.

TunableVariant.name: discoveries
TunableVariant.description: Tuning data for when this chapter's history is discovered by the player. Contains a list of discoveries each with a test. The first discovery to pass its test will be revealed to the player.

TunableVariant.name: string
TunableVariant.description: String to display when this chapter's history is discovered by the player.

TunableTuple.name: concatenation
TunableTuple.description: A list of localized string concatenations. These strings will be joined together into single line-separated string

TunableVariant.description: This may be tuned in place here using 'literal' or as a reference to a LocalizedString tuning snippet.

Tunable.name: literal
Tunable.description: A localized string that may use tokens.

Tunable.name: reference
Tunable.description: A reference to a LocalizedString tuning snippet.

Tunable.name: single
Tunable.description: A localized string that may use tokens.

TunableTuple.name: variation
TunableTuple.description: A list of possible localized string variations.

Tunable.description: A localized string that may use tokens.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A set of tests to be run on this discovery to determine if it should be shown to the player.

TunableList.name: token_participants
TunableList.description: Expected participants required to generate tokens used to localize this string. The order of participants in this list will define the token indices starting from index 3 (this string is assumed to be triggered as interaction loot so 0 is used for the interaction actor sim, 1 is used for interaction target, 2 is used for the chapter's owning sim/household). Tuning to define what data will be stored in each participant can be tuned in this chapter's actions.

TunableList.name: drama_nodes
TunableList.description: A list of additional drama nodes that we will score and schedule when this chapter is complete.

Tunable.description: A drama node that we will score and schedule when this chapter is complete.

TunableList.name: loot_list
TunableList.description: A list of loot that will be applied when chapter is complete. This will be applied after the actions are applied.

Tunable.description: An individual loot that will be applied when the chapter has been completed.

TunableList.name: pre_action_loot_list
TunableList.description: A list of loot that will be applied if the chapter passes its preconditions. This will be applied before the actions are applied.

Tunable.description: An individual loot that will be applied when the chapter has passed its preconditions.

TdescFragTag.name: preconditions
TdescFragTag.description: A set of tests that need to pass before this chapter can progress.
